thread.title: Mariota named NFL Offensive Rookie of the Month
thread.title_full: Mariota named NFL Offensive Rookie of the Month

author: Kara Apel
title: Mariota named NFL Offensive Rookie of the Month
text:
Mariota named NFL Offensive Rookie of the Month Posted: NASHVILLE, TN (WSMV) - 
Titans quarterback Marcus Mariota has been named NFL Offensive Rookie of the Month. 
According to the Titans, Mariota is the fourth Titans/Oiler player to win Rookie of the Month. Other honorees include Eddie George, Jevon Kearse and Chris Johnson. 
Through three starts, Mariota has completed 61-of-97 passes for 833 yards and eight touchdowns. 
After Week 1's win over Tampa Bay, Mariota was named the NFL’s Offensive Player of the Week. 
The Titans have a bye this Sunday. Their next game is against the Bills on Oct. 11 at Nissan Stadium.
